photoAlbum.view

Class AlbumController

  • java.lang.Object
    • photoAlbum.view.AlbumController

  • public class AlbumController
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AlbumController() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void displayImage(Photo photo)
      When an item is selected off the thumbnails to the side, displays a larger image in the main view and displays the image info below
      void handleAddPhoto(javafx.event.Event e)
      Opens a FileChooser to pick photo files from the machine to add to the album.
      void handleDeletePhoto(javafx.event.Event e)
      Removes photo from the album by removing it from all lists associated with the album.
      void handleEditPhoto(javafx.event.Event e)
      Opens up an edit dialog box with fields to set a caption and tags for the photo or even change the album the photo is in.
      void handleLast(javafx.event.Event e)
      Changes the selected thumbnail to the previous one on the list or if at the beginning, last on the list or if the only one or no thumbnails, does nothing
      void handleNext(javafx.event.Event e)
      Changes the selected thumbnail to the one next on the list or if at the end, first on the list or if the only one or no thumbnails, does nothing
      void handleOpenSearch(javafx.event.Event e)
      Opens a Search window, separate from the main application window where users can use search criteria to find specific photos based on tags or dates
      void initialize() 
      void setAlbum(User user, Album album, PhotoAlbum photoAlbum, int index)
      Connects the Album View and it's controller to the main application instance

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()

      • handleAddPhoto

        public void handleAddPhoto(javafx.event.Event e)
        Opens a FileChooser to pick photo files from the machine to add to the album. When a file is chosen, opens the edit dialog to set details.
        Parameters:
        e - Event

      • handleEditPhoto

        public void handleEditPhoto(javafx.event.Event e)
        Opens up an edit dialog box with fields to set a caption and tags for the photo or even change the album the photo is in.
        Parameters:
        e - Event

      • handleDeletePhoto

        public void handleDeletePhoto(javafx.event.Event e)
                       throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Removes photo from the album by removing it from all lists associated with the album.
        Parameters:
        e - Event
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

        When an item is selected off the thumbnails to the side, displays a larger image in the main view and displays the image info below
        Parameters:
        photo -

      • handleNext

        public void handleNext(javafx.event.Event e)
        Changes the selected thumbnail to the one next on the list or if at the end, first on the list or if the only one or no thumbnails, does nothing
        Parameters:
        e - Event

      • handleLast

        public void handleLast(javafx.event.Event e)
        Changes the selected thumbnail to the previous one on the list or if at the beginning, last on the list or if the only one or no thumbnails, does nothing
        Parameters:
        e - Event

      • handleOpenSearch

        public void handleOpenSearch(javafx.event.Event e)
        Opens a Search window, separate from the main application window where users can use search criteria to find specific photos based on tags or dates
        Parameters:
        e - Event

      • setAlbum

        public void setAlbum(User user,
                     Album album,
                     PhotoAlbum photoAlbum,
                     int index)
        Connects the Album View and it's controller to the main application instance
        Parameters:
        user - current user that owns the album showing
        album - current album that is showing
        photoAlbum -
        index - index of selected item on album list
